thread.section_title: Cash4Books.net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cash4Books.net | www.cash4books.net
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: The site was easy to use. The staff was friendly when I had a concern. My payment didn't get to my PayPal account so I checked and I had missed a letter in my email. Emailed them after easily changing the email in my account and they replied fast and money was there the next day! Not 5 stars because I felt they should have gotten notice that that email didn't work from PayPal and contacted me, however, it was my initial error!
